messages.title: 3 Positive reasons to vote for Nick Gibb
messages.content: An effective campaigner, Standing up for people, A new politics.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Nick has been at the forefront of successful campaigns to save St Richards and to prevent house building on unspoilt countryside.
Nick supports a less confrontational and more sincere approach and believes MPs have a duty to stand up against injustice and bureaucracy.
Nick has a track record as a good local MP who has worked hard both inside and outside Parliament.

housing.content: prevent house building on unspoilt countryside

contactInformation.address: 2 Flansham Business Park, Hoe Lane, Flansham, Bognor Regis, PO22 8NJ

images.caption: Vote for the change we need in Britain
